name: Pop into the Movies Quiz | Other Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these movies featured Hot Chocolate singing 'You Sexy Thing'?
options: Ten Things I Hate About You
questions.explanation:
The Full Monty.

	This movie, following the exploits of six unemployed UK steel workers, stars Robert Carlisle. The lads start a strip show to earn cash. The title 'Full Monty' means to go totally nude. Hot Chocolate originally hit the UK charts with 'You Sexy Thing' in 1975.

questions.text: 'Independent Women' was sung by Destiny's Child on the soundtrack of which film?
questions.explanation:
Charlie's Angels.

	'Charlie's Angels' stars Cameron Diaz, Lucy Liu and Drew Barrymore as three female detectives. The movie is based on the seventies TV show of the same name. Destiny's Child topped the US and UK charts with 'Independent Women' in 2000.

questions.text: Ronan Keating's song 'When you Say Nothing at All' was heard in which of these movies?
questions.explanation:
Notting Hill.

	Hugh Grant and Julia Roberts star in this romantic comedy. 'When You Say Nothing at All' was a UK hit in 1999 for Ronan Keating.

questions.text: 'Pure Shores' was the song. All Saints was the group. What was the film?
questions.explanation:
The Beach.

	Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this movie as Richard, a young American who travels to Asia. The song 'Pure Shores' was a #1 UK hit for All Saints in 2000.

questions.text: In which of these movies did Elvis Costello sing 'She'?
questions.explanation:
Notting Hill.

	Hugh Grant plays a bookshop owner in this romantic comedy. Julia Roberts plays a film star who visits his bookshop, and Grant's character falls in love at first sight. The song 'She' was originally recorded by Charles Aznavour.

questions.text: Which male vocalist duetted with Jennifer Warnes on 'Up Where We Belong' from 'An Officer and a Gentleman'?
questions.explanation:
Joe Cocker.

	Starring Richard Gere as Zack, 'An Officer and a Gentleman' shows the character forming process of Officer Candidate School as Zack trains to become a Navy pilot. 'Up Where We Belong' was a US #1 and UK #7 hit for Joe Cocker and Jennifer Warnes in 1983.

questions.text: Dido sang 'Thank You' in which of these films?
questions.explanation:
Sliding Doors.

	Gwyneth Paltrow plays Helen who leads two lives, both determined by a different turn of events. 'Thank You' was a 2001 hit for Dido.

questions.text: In which of these movies did the group Wet Wet Wet sing 'Love is all Around'?
questions.explanation:
Four Weddings and a Funeral.

	Hugh Grant and Andie McDowell star as a couple who have trouble trying to get married. Charlie (Grant) finds it difficult to commit to the relationship. 'Love is All Around' was originally a UK hit for The Trogs in 1967. Wet Wet Wet gave the song a second outing in 1994.

questions.text: Donna Summer reckoned which of these movies was 'Hot Stuff'?
questions.explanation:
The Full Monty.

	Robert Carlisle and Hugo Spear star in this British movie directed by Peter Cattaneo. 'Hot Stuff' was a hit for Donna Summer in 1979 - US #1 and UK #11.

questions.text: Which veteran pop star sang 'Oh Pretty Woman' on the soundtrack of 'Pretty Woman'?
questions.explanation:
Roy Orbison.

	The improbable story of a love affair between a struggling working girl and a corporate boss. The movie stars Julia Roberts and Richard Gere. Roy Orbison topped the US and UK charts with 'Oh Pretty Woman' in 1964.
